Package camp

Interface IEditCamp

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StaffCampEditor
    public interface IEditCamp
    Represents an interface to edit the details of a camp within a camp database.
    Since:
    2023-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Soo Qi Yang, Teo Kai Xuan, Masagca Merwyn Louie Dumasis, Nguyen Phuong Linh, Tee Jeeng Yee

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean changeAttendeeSlots​(User user, String campName, int newTotalSlots)
      Changes the total attendee slots of the camp.
      boolean changeCampComSlots​(User user, String campName, int newCampComSlots)
      Changes the total camp committee slots of the camp.
      boolean changeCampName​(User user, String campName, String newCampName)
      Changes the name of the camp.
      boolean changeDescription​(User user, String campName, String newDescription)
      Changes the description of the camp.
      boolean changeLocation​(User user, String campName, String newLocation)
      Changes the location of the camp.
      boolean changeRegClosingDate​(User user, String campName, String newRegClosingDate)
      Changes the registration closing date of the camp.
      boolean changeStartDate​(User user, String campName, String newStartDate)
      Changes the start date of the camp.
      boolean changeVisibility​(User user, String campName, boolean newVisibility)
      Changes the visibility status of the camp.

    • Method Detail

      • changeCampName

        boolean changeCampName​(User user,
                       String campName,
                       String newCampName)
        Changes the name of the camp.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who wants to edit the camp
        campName - The name of the target camp.
        newCampName - The new camp name.
        Returns:
        Implementors should return true on success and false on failure.
